sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā jiǔdiàn de fúwù hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le service de cet hôtel est très bon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The service of this hotel is very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 你觉得这部电影怎么样？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ juéde zhè bù diànyǐng zěnmeyàng?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What do you think of this movie?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen zài zhèlǐ mài shuǐguǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They sell fruits here.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān qī diǎn qǐchuáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me lève à sept heures chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I get up at seven o'clock every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 您好，请问有什么可以帮您的？
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nínhǎo, qǐngwèn yǒu shénme kěyǐ bāng nín de?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hello, how may I help you?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ mén guānshàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please close the door.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zǎocān nǐ xiǎng chī shénme?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Que veux-tu manger pour le petit-déjeuner ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What do you want to eat for breakfast?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yīhuìr jiù lái.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He will come in a moment.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng chūshì nín de piào.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please show your ticket.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wàimiàn fēng chuī de hěn dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The wind is blowing hard outside.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yùdìng le yī jiā jiǔdiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I booked a hotel.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wàimiàn hěn lěng, kuài jìnlái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait froid dehors, entre vite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's cold outside, come in quickly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǐshì gōngzuò de yī bùfèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est qu'une partie du travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is only a part of the work.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ de māo, tā hěn kě'ài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est mon chat, il est très mignon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is my cat, it's very cute.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè dào tí tài nán le.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This question is too difficult.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng wèn nǐ yī gè wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais te poser une question.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to ask you a question.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizimen zài gōngyuán lǐ wán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants jouent dans le parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The children are playing in the park.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiáng shàng guà zhe yī fú huà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un tableau accroché au mur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a painting hanging on the wall.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng xiàng zuǒ zhuǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn left.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī jiàn xīn yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I bought a new piece of clothing.
